story_title: Washington's Secret Talks for Global Democracy
original_story: [curious] Here’s the wild part—George Washington, our founding father, was secretly chatting with European anti-monarchists! In 1783, he engaged in clandestine discussions with revolutionary leaders like Thomas Paine. They didn’t just want independence; they aimed for a global democratic revolution. Imagine Washington, not just a general, but a potential architect of worldwide freedom! This shocking alliance hints at a broader vision—one that could have reshaped history. So, what if Washington was more than just a national hero? What if he was a global revolutionary?
